attributes.action: Make the acting prime minister answer a Question directly in Parliament.
attributes.background:
Every PMQ session is a mockery to the UK tax payer. The 'In jokes', sneering, sniping and shouting are
all orchestrated to avoid giving direct answers to direct questions. David Cameron is making a mockery out of Democracy. The tax payer deserves more accountability and straight answers.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Parliament and Government. For example, your petition doesn't specify who should decide whether the Prime Minister has or has not answered the question. 

You might be interested in signing the following petition which is similar to your petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/118388
